name: Stourgreen
overview:
Stourgreen is an Independent Technology Advisor that supports a broad range of global private and public sector clients make the right technology and strategy decisions.

Stourgreen are a professional firm of independent technology advisors committed to providing objective and comprehensive advice to a broad range of global private and public sector clients to support their technology and strategy decisions.

Stourgreen offers vendor independent advice on the latest technology solutions and advancements across all environments and sectors, recommending technology solutions that transform your enterprise and achieves your business strategies.
